TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void Item.SelfSizingDelegate(Item item, ref float width, ref float height);
.class nested public auto ansi sealed Item/SelfSizingDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The item that is being self-sized.
The future item's width, passed by reference, and initialized with the item's default width.
The future item's height, passed by reference, and initialized with the item's default height.
